review_text: We had a great time at Jay’s house in Pittsfield. It was the perfect setting for our family, ages 4 months to 82! The house is spacious and well designed to accommodate a family gathering. Plenty of bedrooms and bathrooms for all of us. The pool was a focal point of our activities and we also enjoyed using the kayaks on the beautiful lake. The kitchen was well stocked and had plenty of space for our supplies. Jay is a wonderful host and he and the property manager Stephanie were responsive to our needs. All and all, a wonderful way to spend Memorial Day weekend.
Place was awesome! Very big with a beautiful outdoor. Highly recommend this house

One of the nicest airbnb I’ve stayed in. It was true to its’ description. The house was spotless and well organized. Everything that was needed was provided. We especially enjoyed the views of the lake, along with all the equipment provided for lake fun. Jay and Stephanie communicated quickly and clearly. Everything was well maintained and cared for. Great location for a piece of serenity.
Our only regret was that we booked too short a stay. Definitely hoping to be back again!

Great location and house. Beds are super comfy and pretty much everything you need for a comfortable and enjoyable stay. Would love to experience it in warmer and sunnier weather in the future to get the full experience on the lake!
Jay we have a good time at your house everything was nice and clean I love everything about it no complain

The house has a very calm, spacious feel with the welcoming feel of home. It is layed out to accommodate an entire family in one bedroom for those who have small kids who prefer to sleep close to their oarents. We all experienced good quality sleep. The view of the lake is up front and beautiful. It's clear that the home is well maintained and the owners were very gracious and accommodating.
The location is central, with bowling and a great kids play space a short drive away. It's a only a half hour drive to The Clark and Mass Moca and equally convenient drives to the Lee Outlets, farm-to-table dining in Great Barrington, and other key Berkshires attractions.
We would stay there again in a heartbeat!
Absolutely beautiful home. Will definitely rent again!

Stayed at this property for New Year's with two other families. Plenty of room for 14 people-hit a couple local restaurants and Jiminy Peak for some skiing. 100% would rent here again, great property and great location!

We enjoyed our stay in Jay’s house for 4 days during Christmas break. we here for snowboarding in Jiminy peak. Nice and big house clean and neat, cozy living room with the fireplace, fully equipped kitchen has everything you need, comfy bedding with king size in all rooms, convenient shelves for helmets and hanging jackets, also bench for putting on boots. Jay is very friendly and responsible, always reply me immediately. Will definitely stay here again if we visit Jiminy peak.

This is a wonderful home, with lots of open space, perfect for a large family gathering. The kitchen was well supplied with quality pots and pans and serving pieces. Large bathrooms and bedrooms made everyone comfortable. I would definitely stay here again. And the location on the lake is peaceful and relaxing.
The house is beautiful! In the mornings we spent a lot of time admiring the lake from the huge windows in the back. Felt so spacious, airy and clean!

The house was very clean, modern looking and had a great view of the lake! There was plenty of room for everyone to sleep comfortably and for everyone to hang out during the day! I would definitely recommend for large groups!

place was absolutely amazing for our group of 12 during a retreat. We did not struggle for space, everything is spacious (even better than I expected from pictures honestly). And the view of the lake was gorgeous. kayaks and firepit allow you to have great time while at the airbnb, and the surrounding area was great for views during fall. Especially Mt. Greylock! Lastly, Jay is very responsive and understanding. Definitely would recommed.

This is the perfect getaway spot! We enjoyed our stay with our children and grandkids. There was plenty of room and lots to do. Jay is an excellent host and Stephanie, house manager, took care of all our needs. We will definitely plan to return for many more family vacations!

Beautiful house, exactly as it appears in the photos. Host was very responsive and helpful. We had a group of 11 that fit comfortably and had plenty of space. We enjoyed the firepit and ping pong table. The house was stocked with plenty of linens/towels, toilet paper, paper towels, paper plates, etc. Highly recommend this home!
Memories were made that will last a lifetime
Beautiful and spacious house, gorgeous lake views, amazing pool. Our family of 8 adults and 5 children (ages 7 1/2 to 17 months) enjoyed our stay immensely!

This home is beautiful! Frankly, the pictures do not do it justice! It was a very accommodating home with all linens and towels provided. We held our family reunion there and enjoyed the pool and the kayaks along with the beautiful views of the lake. Highly recommend this home!

This is a beautiful house, with plenty of space for my family to enjoy the weekend together. We enjoyed the nice kitchen/dining/common room space, large deck/seating, nice pool, and kayaks on the lake. All the bedrooms/bathrooms were very nice. It exceeded my family’s expectations! If our travels take us into the Berkshires again, we would love to return and stay here!

Great Lake house heated pool combo. Stayed for my wedding party and the house easily accommodated everyone. We spent lots of time in the pool. Great back lawn for games, weather was perfect making our stay even better. Would book again.

Super highly recommended. The house was very clean and have all the things we need, even with things we didn't expect them to provide like shampoo, body wash, coffee, tea, sugar, etc. We enjoyed the peaceful lake view at the back. Will visit again for sure. Thanks Jay & Rhonda (and Stephanie) for sharing your home with us.

Thank you Jay for the pleasant stay.
I felt right at home and the place was beautifully, neat and quiet. This place is a hidden gem for all of those thinking about visiting the Berkshires. My next trip to the Berkshires will definitely be this place.
Owner is very responsive when it comes to answering questions. He is honest and everything you see in the picture is what you get with your stay.

We had our wedding party stay here and it was the perfect house. Close to local attractions and easy to get to. There were plenty of bathrooms and it slept so many people! There was great parking. We had no problems getting the limo, photographers, and wedding party parked and in the house for the pre wedding festivities. Great kitchen that was fully stocked.

This is a beautiful comfortable home. Great for family gatherings. The couches were extremely comfortable. Plenty of seating for a large family. Place was very clean and looks and well decorated. Beautiful pictures/art hanging from the walls.
Very clean inviting place with an amazing view! Everything was perfect from the booking to check-out!
This house is absolutely fantastic for a family or a group - spacious with room to spread out indoors or out. The beds are also top tier, everyone in our group was raving about them!
Beautiful home !! We’d stay again
Wonderful house and great location. Close to local attractions. Very nice quiet neighborhood. We really enjoyed the deck especially in the evening. The sunsets on the lake were beautiful.
We had a great stay at a beautiful house and lake.

Beautiful house and location. The pictures do not do this Place justice.
A few problems occurred during our stay but they were in contact contact and did everything they could to make it right.
The lake. Pool. And house are all amazing and I plan on renting again next year

Just returned from a wonderful week at this beautiful house. We were four kids and six adults and had plenty of room to spread out and have our own spaces. The kids loved their bunk beds! And The king sized beds were all very comfortable. The house was perfect for all spending time together in the huge great room, being able to look out on the beautiful lake. We loved swimming in the pool, lounging on the deck, building a fire down by the lake , and taking the kayaks out on the beautiful lake. Check in was super easy and the house was immaculately clean. Kitchen very well appointed and we also used the grill one night. The pictures don’t do the views justice! Highly recommend!
This is a beautiful home with so many great activities! I would definitely visit again.

Jay’s homes are tastefully manicured and are clearly well maintained to host groups. The location is unbeatable if you’re looking for a place to relax on the lake, and Jay and team made it so easy to checkin/checkout, gave us a ton of recommendations. We hosted my groomsmen for my wedding this weekend and my only regret is that we didn’t spend more time at the Airbnb because there was so much to enjoy
This property is everything you expect plus more! It’s super clean, beautifully furnished, gorgeous view!

We stay at many air bnbs, and Jay’s place was one of the best! Every bed is comfortable, it is extremely clean and well equipped. Perfect for a big group!!! The lake is absolutely beautiful and the town is very cute. We will definitely come back!
This was such a wonderful place to stay. It’s large enough for big families with kids - it was clean and tidy. Definitely recommend.
Jay’s home is so spacious and fantastic. Highly recommend and hope to return!
Amazing view. Lovely home. We where all so happy with this Lake house. It was perfect in every way. We look forward to coming back.

The photos don’t do this place justice. We had a multi family reunion with all ages. This space provided room for everyone to not feel like we were on top of each other. Also, super comfy beds and beautiful layout! The view and the fishing was awesome too. Would definitely stay here again.

My husband and I just returned from our annual weeklong vacation hosting our three children and their families, 14 of us in all. We chose to stay at Jay’s Berkshire Lake House this year and couldn’t have been happier. The home absolutely exceeded our expectations. Plenty of parking, an open, spacious layout with plenty of natural light and gorgeous views. The home is newly renovated. The bedrooms & bathrooms are beautiful; the kitchen has great storage & counter space. Everything was spot less & with extremely comfortable furniture & beds. The dining room table was a great size for our family meals & game nights. We spent most of our days on the huge back deck overlooking the lake & beautiful mountains. We loved the pool; swam, fished & kayaked in the lake & enjoyed several evenings around the fire pit. Jay & the property manager were extremely responsive & helpful. All family members agree this was one of our best vacation homes ever.

This home is a beauty. My family and I had such a wonderful time here. It was our first vacation since quarantine The home was large and well decorated. The pictures don't do justice to the home. Everything was clean, the pool was beautiful and we had a blast on the lake with the kayaks/paddleboards. We would highly recommend any stay here.
Carla’s place was so beautiful! We can’t wait to return!
Wonderful and relaxing spot. Small but had everything you need. Lovely to watch and hear the chickens in the morning.
Thank you for a short but wonderful stay. This place is a serene escape, but minutes to restaurants and activities in Pittsfield.

I had a wonderful stay and hope it’s available next time I am in the area. The studio was spotlessly clean and the bed comfortable, important as I have chronic back pain. The balcony overlooking the farmlands was the perfect place to enjoy morning coffee.
I had an extremely smooth checkin despite arriving much later than planned. A great visit and I hope to be able to stay here again!
The place was beautiful, clean and very comfortable. Everything you could want in a beautiful environment. The hosts were great as well. Great communication. Overall great stay!
We really enjoyed our stay in the cute little apartment.
Very pleased with the space. Exactly as described and Carla was very responsive and friendly.

This studio apartment was awesome. It had everything you would need in a kitchen, big bathroom, and spacious living area. The TV was easy to navigate and was a Roku TV where you could add your own apps in a guest mode so that it would automatically sign you out when you checked out. One other really nice feature was a noise canceling machine near the bed where you could play white noise or a fan sound. The views were amazing!

Such a nice spot to rest, a perfect home base to explore this great part of the state. Small, but has all you need for a couple to sleep, relax, and cook small meals. Quiet, comfortable, lovely. Also easy to find!
Clean, and comfortable. Thanks for a great stay Clara
I was comfortable here while visiting my son nearby. The apartment was perfect, clean and comfy with views of farmland, wetland, lovely!

We loved Carla's place. We have spent a week and a half traveling and this place is our favorite for this trip. We should have booked it for 2 nights for a little downtime during our road trip. Next time we will be. This is the perfect airbnb.
Very cozy little airbnb. I enjoyed staying here.
Carla’s place was amazing I stayed just a night there but it was amazing and so clean. The bed was to die for felt like clouds.

The studio was exactly as described, probably a bit nicer than the photos! It's very spacious for a couple, and we appreciated the little touches like coffee, tea, creamer, and snacks. Even though it was a rainy weekend we still enjoyed the views of the farm. We would be happy to return!
Very comfortable place with thoughtful touches. Definitely recommend and will stay again when i come back to Berkshires again.

Had a nice, peaceful stay for a weekend getaway to the Berkshires! The place was just as advertised and was very clean. Carla was a great host. A few minute drive to the nearby downtown area for food, etc. The farm animals were also very friendly! :)
We had a great time staying at Carla’s studio. Everything was exactly as you see in the photos. Very clean and easy to get to and check into. 5/5 would recommend!
Beautiful place and excellent host!
Thank you so much you’re the best and the animals are amazing!
Great space, decorated beautifully and well-stocked. Clean and exactly as pictured. Would absolutely visit again and recommend to friends and family!
Very comfortable and clean studio with everything a couple could need. Wish we got to stay there longer, as we were on our way to a ski trip!
Beautiful place with nice view, sparking clean, great host. Thank you!
The place was stocked with coffee pods, condiments, plenty of cooking supplies, teas, cotton balls, toothbrushes, etc. She went above and beyond.
My husband and I loved our stay here. It was close to downtown Pittsfield and surrounding ski areas. We also loved walking the grounds with our dog. Highly recommend!
Such a nice place - it had everything we needed for our short stay. Wonderful setting too. We hope to return soon!

Carla is a great host and the space was so cute and cozy! We went around Christmas and the whole apartment was decorated for the holiday which was such a treat :) thanks so much Carla we can’t wait to stay again!
Carla’s place was a great stay while visiting family for the holidays. Peaceful, quiet, and close to the nearby town! Would definitely stay again while visiting.
Thanks for a lovely time at bittersweet farm! We loved the scenery and the space. It was very nicely decorated and clean.
Lovely little studio space in a quaint location with an incredibly kind host. I stayed here before going to Kripalu for a day of R&R and it could not have been a better way to start the trip.

Carla was great and we
loved having out with the animals!
This place was a delight. Quiet, cozy, and I loved wandering down to see the chickens and goats. Highly recommended.
Great stay for the weekend. Near a lot of Berkshire towns. Beautiful view to wake up to on the farm. Great host

Great location. Very comfortable and compact, fine for 1-2 people. Kitchen had great cooking gear and clean, up-to-date appliances. Bathroom was very clean and a good size. There were 3 inches of snow the day before I arrived and Carla made sure there was Sno-Melt on the stairs. I would stay here again in a heartbeat.

We loved Carla’s place. It was first class. Everything you could think of was provided. We appreciated the attention to details, even as far as having bandaids available! It was super clean and quiet. We will definitely be back for another visit!!

The farm is just beautiful! It was fun to see the goats and horses being let out in the morning. The chickens were so funny to watch, and every so often we would see their lovely dogs! We played fetch with their corgi who is adorable. Definitely the perfect stay for animal lovers. The farm stand has eggs, and still had some produce at the end of October. We picked up some potatoes, peppers and hot peppers, acorn squash, an onion, and butternut squash!
Carla provided excellent recommendations (HAVE to get Betty’s pizza).
The room was nice and clean, and themed for the fall. Lil snacks and coffee provided! Roku TV, surprisingly good internet. We would love to come back someday!

We would stay there again because I loved listening to the chickens, who were not loud at all, after a day out running around It was relaxing and that is exactly what I was looking for. We love being outdoors and love history so there is plenty to do in the Berkshires. We were a few weeks late for the leaves, but there still was some color and Fall is majestic is New England!
Very nice studio, arranged with great care. Very comfortable, warm. Beautiful view of the Berkshires.

Carla's private studio was peaceful, super clean, well-stocked, and provided a great night's sleep! I would highly recommend staying here ...as a stay on the farm (being close to nature and watching the animals) always restores the soul!

Carla’s place is absolutely amazing! Peaceful, clean and a great location. You are missing out if you don’t book with Carla, truly one of the best Airbnb’s we have stayed at!! Close to tons of hiking and walking trails and our favorite market Guidos😊 Carla was available if you had any questions and it was fun sitting on the deck watching the goats and horses. We definitely plan to stay here again!!
Very peaceful place. The apartment has everything you need. Very clean and comfortable.

Bittersweet farm was the perfect digs for our Berkshires weekend! this was our first trip bringing our dog along with us, and he enjoyed the stay as well. this little guest unit was squeaky clean and very cozy, overlooking a beautiful farm view. I would highly recommend this spot!

Carla’s place was exactly as described. It was the cleanest AirBnB we have ever stayed in! Carla was extremely responsive and a wonderful host. The farm was beautiful and provided stunning views. Definitely a peaceful retreat!

Carla’s place was exactly what we needed for a weekend in the Berkshires. We have been coming to the area every Fall for the last 7 years and this was our favorite Airbnb so far. Very simple, clean, modern - heat, AC, TV - anything you need. Location was close to all our favorite spots . Would definitely recommend.

We had a great time. Peaceful setting with mountain view, friendly farm animals, well stocked kitchen.
Highly recommended..
Thank you Carla for our wonderful time there..
Everything was fine. Very clean. Great view of the surroundings. Quiet country setting yet not too remote.
Beautiful and serene location. The suite was perfect in every way. We used it as a base for touring the Berkshires. Highly recommend and the farm stand was a bonus!!!!
Carla’s place is super clean, very peaceful and well equipped. I would not hesitate to visit again. Thank you for a great stay!
Modern, well appointed, extremely clean studio at a beautiful, peaceful farm. Highly recommend.

Was better than expected!! Cute and clean!! Very quite and peaceful even being on a working farm. Loved the views and the farm animals. Walked over to the chickens, horses and goats. One goat came over to say hi (May have smelled out leftovers). Was a joy to watch one of the horses gallop around the field.
Thank you!
We had a very enjoyable stay. It was nice to walk around the farm and meet Buddy. We would stay here again.

This is a beautiful little studio amidst a working farm, with goats, horses, dogs, fresh fruits and vegetables, and a quiet country setting. The kitchen is well equipped and the location is close to Pittsfield, but decidedly rural in character. If you have a dog, or anyone similarly curious but incautious, beware of the electric fence around the pasture!

Terrific Airbnb with full amenities on a wonderful farm setting….the studio is in a fully converted barn (hostess lives downstairs) with a nice contemporary renovation. The studio is really well thought out and well supplied. It has a little kitchenette (with a full refrigerator not mini frig and little stove, not just microwave) that is supplied enough to cook a meal. It is truly a little apartment with a nice patio door and deck looking over the small farm and animals (chickens and horses) and beautiful views of the mountains. As rural as it is, you’re only minutes away from Bousquet ski and sports center, and the Pittsfield/Lenox area of shops including Guido’s, my favorite fresh food market.

Location: Very convenient to Pittsfield, Lenox and BNRC hiking trails. All within a 5 to 15 minute drive.
Property: They sell eggs and produce on-site. The plums were delicious! The chickens were fun to watch, and they did not disturb or wake us at all. The dogs were incredibly well-behaved.
Studio apartment: Strong WiFi with no issues with connectivity. (Note: we have Verizon and cell service was weak throughout the entire Berkshires.) The apartment was tastefully decorated, very clean, and Carla provided clear directions via the Airbnb app and within the apartment.
We had a cozy, quiet stay, and would recommend this place for couples.

Carla’s place was absolutely lovely. It was spotless, so clean and comfortable. There was everything you needed to make a meal. The bed and chairs were super comfortable. We loved staying on the farm and buying some of their fresh produce and home baked good which were delicious. We would definitely stay again.

Perfect place to stay. Easy to get, too. The owner, Carla, was great to communicate with and quick to respond back. Pleasant surroundings. Beautiful decor and very super clean. Everything was well prepared, and we couldn't ask for a better setup. It was great waking up to the beautiful scenery around the farm. A plus was the framstand. Thanks for holding 2 dozen fresh eggs for us, and the fresh flowers were perfect.

My wife and I absolutely loved staying here on Bittersweet Farms - a beautifully furnished and decorated studio in a beautiful surrounding on a working farm with a view of the mountains and water. The horses and goats in the pasture made it look like a postcard. Close to shopping and supermarkets and lots of hiking and Tanglewood. We went on some great hikes and saw Jackson Browne at Tanglewood right down the street. We will come back for sure!
A wonderful, peaceful stay in the Berkshires. Carla’s farm is the perfect location for all local activities.
We loved being on a farm. Used the AC fan to block out the early morning roosters. Seems newly remodeled. Although the only sink was in the bathroom it was designed for dishwashing. So me problem.
Thank you Carla. Your farm is peaceful and beautiful. We enjoyed our stay.
Great visit… everything exactly as expected. Carla thought of everything to make visit comfortable. Seeing hummingbirds outside was a bonus!

Our farm stay was different in a good sense. I like the green surroundings, the friendly animals, gorgeous to watch sunrise and peaceful to sit on the balcony facing the open greens in the evening.
Carla’s farm stand provides eggs, fresh fruits and vegetables. Also great homemade muffins!
Light sleepers take note that the cocks crow everyday, yes, rain or shine, at 4:15am to start the day!
The studio is beautiful. Small but well appointed. Gorgeous view and surroundings. And a very clean and comfortable place. We would definitely come back.
Carla’s place was perfect for our weekend getaway to the Berkshires! Thanks for your hospitality!

My husband and I visited the area with our baby and dog. The studio worked really well for our two night stay. It was very clean and had a very well stocked kitchenette. Carla and others at the farm were very friendly and gave us lots of helpful info about where we could walk our dog on the farm property and lots of recommendations about hikes and outdoor activities to do nearby. The studio deck looked out on beautiful area mountains, the chicken coop, stables, and farm fields. The veggies and baked goods at the farm stand were delicious too! Location was overall convenient to Lenox, Tanglewood, and even to towns in NY like Chatham.

This was a perfect location for going to visit our kids for parents visiting day at nearby camp locations. Close to Lenox and Tanglewood and just super central to everything. We appreciated the property and the cleanliness of the space. I would rent this location again.

Such a nice, clean studio apartment with everything we needed in a beautiful location. Close to many things to do; we enjoyed Tanglewood, hiking and good restaurants. Great for a weekend getaway or longer. We would definitely stay here again.

We had a great time! It was quiet & super clean. My 5 year old loved visiting the animals; the host and her sister were very accommodating to her and welcomed her to pet the animals & explore. The bed was comfy for a Fredy nights sleep. We would definitely return!

What a fantastic gem so close to Tanglewood. Peaceful setting, clean and clutter free space with an extremely well stocked kitchen! Goats, horses and chickens at the farm for entertainment. All with really spectacular views. We will be back. Thank you, Carla for having us!
The space was exactly as described. A lovely setting on the working farm. Everything was clean and modern. Wonderful stay!
Really nice space. Great location for Berkshire getaway.
Carla's is a beautiful, bucolic spot! Easy access to Pittsfield, Lenox and Williamstown. I'd stay here again in a heartbeat!

Carla's place was very clean and it had everything we needed. The kitchen had a Keurig with a few selections of k-cups along with snacks. The bathroom was also well stocked with towels, toilet paper, shampoo and conditioner, and body wash. In addition, we love the surroundings because it was so peaceful! We will definitely stay here again!
Carla’s place was the perfect, quiet retreat I was looking for. Close to downtown and lots of other things, but far enough away to be completely serene, and with a gorgeous view of the mountains!

We loved our stay at Carla’s. A calm, secluded place for a retreat: you can take in the sights from the second floor studio, including beautiful scenery and fun, friendly farm animals. It’s a really lovely, clean, peaceful place that is close to local attractions, hiking, and dining. We will definitely return.
Carla’s upstairs suite was super clean, comfortable, cozy and well-equipped. We had everything we needed and more.

Frolicking goats, horses flicking their manes and tails at insects real or imagined; chickens pecking the grass in search of tasty morsels. Farm fresh eggs for sale. Quiet. Blessed quiet! We enjoyed every moment of our time here and in meeting friendly Carla and Bonnie as well as their 4 legged companions, Mazey and Trooper. The home was the cleanest Airbnb I have ever visited. Comfort and coziness was the main theme here with beautiful paintings and words of wisdom and welcome throughout. Carla clearly has a gift for decorating and making people feel comfortable.
Thank you, Carla for our wonderful time there. It was a pleasure to meet you and Bonnie and all of your animals. We wish you all the best and may God bless you all.
this place was cute, charming, comfortable and exactly as described! it was the perfect little getaway for two people, and it was private and quiet. thank you for letting us stay here this weekend!
I love it here, second time staying, its very comfortable, and spotless. Bed is comfortable, scenery gorgeous and very nice hosts. Lots of light and tall ceilings, has a great vibe in general.

it's a beautiful place to be in touch with nature. .
you will find also a lot of trails to choose on the surroundings.
the space is very well finished, perfect for two nature lovers.

Sweet little place with everything you need, very clean and comfy. I loved looking down on the farm field and chickens coop. Very quiet country area but close to everything you need. The river is right on the property too, very scenic. Lots of land to walk your dog if you bring one!
Karla and Tanya have two very sweet dogs too. Highly recommend!
Clean, comfortable, and cozy!

We loved Carlas place, it was super clean, very comfortable for us, nice bed and linens, 2 comfortable recliners, lots of closet space, excellent bathroom with tall ceilings and loads of natural light.....super efficient lay out. Gorgeous view of pond and nature. Very friendly and communicative hosts.

Carla's place was a dream. Staying here brought me and my partner solace and allowed us to rest while we were recovering from a traumatic experience and couldn't be in our home. The farm is beautiful, even moreso than the pictures portray. The river brought calm energy along with the wide open sky. The hosts were responsive and incredibly kind. The studio itself was very comfortable: bed, two recliners all very cozy and we also loved the large bathroom. The kitchen is cute but not as cute as the dogs we saw playing in the snow! My only wish is that the sink were larger since there is only one. Overall, everything was so thoughtfully put together that we couldn't help but feel at home during our stay. Thank you all so much!
Stayed here while working in the area. Will do so again. Very sweet place.
Beautiful studio, property, comfy bed and nice TV! Well worth the price
Carla was attentive, the space was extremely clean and the location was perfect for our itinerary. We hope to be back in the future.
Carla was a wonderful host and her charming farm side appartemnt was clean, private and peacful. Situated just outside Pittsfield on a rural road Definitly reccomend.
Wonderful stay! Close to many hiking trails and the surrounding towns.

Can’t say enough wonderful things about Carla’s studio! I needed a spot close to Kripalu during a weekend program- her place was easy to find(even in the dark) and had everything possible to make me comfortable. Very clean, lovely, and ease of entry made my arrival stress free. Very quiet and peaceful; my only disappointment was not getting to see the animals as it’s the middle of Winter but I would certainly go back.
Traveling for work. Perfect location to get a feel for the area.
Great, clean space with amazing views of the farm!

We really enjoyed our stay at Carla’s place! Exactly as pictured and described. Everything was clean and recently updated, plenty of space for a small-ish apartment. Carla was very responsive and extremely accommodating and friendly. Would highly recommend!
I love it here! We want to move to the Berkshires after this visit… I think that says it all.

a fantastic apartment at beautiful working farm. The place itself is welcoming and fully equipped with everything one would need for a short or a long stay. The farm eggs were delicious and we hope to return soon!
Such a lovely place to stay!
Very nice place, great for couples. Also in a good location.

We loved staying at Carla’s place! It was super centrally located to many restaurants and hiking trails. The goats and horses made for an extra special stay :) The space was a great size for two of us and our dog. If you’re looking for a fun and active weekend getaway, this is a great spot.

Place is super cute and comfy! We loved the clever design of the suite complete with small/function kitchen and the fun fall decor.
Everything was immaculately clean and modern; thermostat in room to manage temps;
The view from the deck was spectacular in the morning with the sun coming over the mountains and watching the horses morning routine.
This was a real working farm — so we had the best fresh eggs and paired them with a freshly roasted, white acorn squash. A perfect fall weekend in a perfect farm nest!
Perfect, in every way

We were so impressed with our stay. The reviews are spot on - and the animals and Carla’s famous muffins are icing on the cake! It is super clean yet still cozy. The sweeping views of the country are especially beautiful this time of year and the heat worked great - a necessity for a Florida girl leaf peepin’ in the Fall in New England! Every detail has been accounted for and we wish we could’ve stayed longer!

We had a lovely stay. Carla made sure there were little homey touches throughout the apartment. The baked goods she left were incredible. It was also great to be able to bring our dog and so nice that food and water bowls and a baby gate for the deck were provided. The location is ideal for many hikes in the area. Highly recommend!

Carla and her sister Tonya were so lovely!!!! We had a wonderful time staying at the studio. It was clean, well stocked with things you may need for cooking—and I appreciated the bathroom necessities since I forgot my shampoo lol! The studio is located near a lot of Berkshire activities and getting anywhere was very easy and a beautiful drive. Her guidebook was also very handy—plenty of fun things to do and great places to eat/drink on there!! We absolutely enjoyed our stay!
We have been to many of AIRBNB's but this was by far the nicest place ever. Clean,Awesome view, and Great hosts!!

The suite is excellent epuipped, you can cook and stay for two weeks without issues. The farm offes various vegetables and eggs. Location is very close to Hancock Shaker Village and not far away from downtown Pittsfield. Carla and Tonya are very kind and helpfull hosts.
A beautiful and relaxing escape. Pictures don’t do it justice - even more beautiful in person!
We really enjoyed our stay. The place is quiet and cozy. The snacks and baked goods are a nice touch and so delicious. Nice spot for us to unwind after a long drive.

Fantastic space, clean and spacious. The farm is lovely and the vegetables were great for a farm to table dinner. Nearby hikes were great with the mahanna cobble. We also climbed Mt. Perfect condo with great hosts. Well stoked with everything we needed for out little getaway. Wish we could have stayed longer. Carla and her sister were great host. PS don't pass on the baked goods at their produce stand. The Banana Chocolate Chip Muffin was amazing!

We enjoyed our stay, everything was great. Accommodation was wonderful. We never wanted for anything that was suppose to be there and the amenities were more than adequate. The hostess and was super friendly, and always checking to make sure that our needs were being met. Would recommend the facilities to anyone.
Charlie and Lisa
The ladies there were great! What a peaceful place and wonderful property. Loved petting the horses and the dogs were real sweet!

This is truly a special spot! We were the first AirBNB guests to stay here and it was just perfect. The first morning we woke up to mist rising over the small lake, hills in the background and horses running in the field. It set the tone for a wonderful and relaxing weekend. The farm itself is beautiful--there's a walking path around the farm where you can see chickens, goats, fields full of corn, flowers, squash and other vegetables. Carla and her sister also operate a farm stand and we made sure to do our veggie shopping for the week before we left, picked up a dozen eggs and also a few of Carla's homemade treats (if you're lucky, she may have freshly baked muffins for sale at the farmstand on weekend mornings!)
The space itself is clean and bright--we immediately felt at home. It has everything that you need, a full kitchen setup, the TV has Roku and there's a small outdoor porch for enjoying the view. It is well located with easy access to Pittsfield, Lenox and North Adams. We explored around Mt. Greylock, MASS MoCA and Pittsfield State Forest and it was a great home base. Carla and her sister Tonya were excellent hosts--easy and quick to communicate with and we enjoyed meeting them around the farm along with their dogs, Buddy and Maisie. We definitely hope to come back for another visit and would highly recommend it!
Beautiful home with an incredible view! Kitchen was well stocked. Our host was proactive with communication and responded quickly to messages sent. Great find!

We had a wonderful winter stay at this lovely lakeside home. The hosts made us feel very welcome, gave clear directions on finding the home and were quick to respond to any questions that we had. It was so nice to come back and relax by the fireplace overlooking the lake after a day of skiing at nearby Jiminy Peak. The views from the great room were beautiful and it was neat to watch people ice fishing on the lake. We also visited MASSMoCA which is one of the many nearby attractions. We would love to come back again in the summer!

My family stayed here just after Christmas to visit family. I grew up in Cheshire and Pittsfield and have family in Pittsfield, Dalton, and Lenox. This place is right in the middle of most of the other towns. 15-20 minutes to get anywhere. Walkable to Dunkin Donuts. :) Oh and Lanesborough pizza(My favorite)
We chose Joseph's place not only for prime location, but sitting in the great room drinking coffee as the sun comes up was the most relaxing part of the trip.
There is steep stairs to the property and to get to the bathroom and bedrooms doesn't make it idea for anyone who struggles with stairs. Our 4 year old did fine, but I wouldn't recommend it for any kids younger than that.
Joseph's place is full stocked, there isn't anything we didn't have there. If you are looking for a lake house to unwind, this is it! We loved it!
Such a wonderful stay! Highly recommended.

We loved our stay at the lake house! It was perfect for our small family and had everything we needed to feel right at home! Gorgeous views with a cozy fireplace 😍 Joe and Jess were wonderful hosts with great communication and helped us out quickly with an issue we had starting the fireplace. We will definitely be back!

Joseph and Jess's place on the lake is a perfect weekend getaway! The house was extremely clean and the personal touches were much appreciated! They have made a great effort to make the place feel like home with all essentials provided. We had a great time!
It was exactly what my family and I needed. The view is amazing, pictures don’t do it justice. Joseph was quick to respond to any questions or requests I had. I truly did not want to leave.

Joe and Jess went above and beyond to prepare for our first vacation as a family. I really appreciated how communicative, helpful, and accommodating they were. The house was very clean and the view of the lake from the deck, yard, and great room is beautiful!

I had a great week at this location. The house is wonderful and had all the necessities and then some. The hosts were excellent, proactively communicating, checking in, and responding quickly to questions. Overall, a nice to place to relax for a few days.

Joe and Jess’ house is lovely and the view of the lake is beautiful. A few friends and I spent a long weekend in the home and were so sad to leave. It had everything we needed and Joe and Jess went out of their way to make sure we were comfortable. We will definitely come back!

Joe & Jess were amazing right from the first time I contacted them about their home. They were extremely patient with some of my pre booking issues! I am so glad we were able to work out some dates for my trip. The house was beautiful and Joe made sure we had everything we needed from start to finish! Thank you so much for sharing your home!
Great getaway with lovely views and amenities

Can't say enough about this beautiful place. It's even more peaceful than the pictures look. We felt right at home. Joe & Jess could not have been nicer and were so responsive throughout the check in process. They leave you with everything you need and then some! Can't wait to come back to this house and sit on this porch at night again.

Joe and Jess were great hosts and made sure we had everything we needed. Not only checked in when we arrived but also during our stay to see if there was anything we needed! Great place and waking up to the view of the lake was very relaxing, even if the weather didn’t communicate. Would recommend to others and stay with them again!
Thank you for sharing your home!
Wonderful stay! We felt very at home and the lake views were exactly what we needed to unwind. Definitely recommend 🙂
Very clean and was just like the pictures.
Great place and would definitely stay here again. Absolutely relaxing and felt better than a resort.

Just as described. Beautiful, quiet, short drive from NYC. Close to ski and -restful. Fireplace overlooking the water was great. Thanks for having us :)

Joe and Jess were great hosts and their place was great. We loved the views of the lake and watching the ice fishing. We’d love t be back in the warmer months to enjoy the decks outside. A great place to experience the Berkshires! The house was very clean and the host was very responsive and easy to communicate with. Would love to visit again in the future!
Great place, great host. Will continue to use every year!
Had a great time, will be back. 5 stars
What a beautiful place! Joe and Jess are thoughtful and accommodating. Very comfortable and beautiful
The perfect fall getaway! Joseph was a great host and the house was wonderful!

Wow- Joseph’s place was awesome! It was very conveniently located with quick access to everything we wanted to do. The views were amazing!! Joseph and Jess were very communicative and gave us their direct numbers in case we had questions or needed recommendations. It was if we were staying with friends or family! Check in and check out we’re easy and simple!! We’ll definitely stay again if we come back!! You won’t regret staying here!
The only thing I would consider for future guests is the fact that the stairs are a bit steep. It wasn’t an issue for us at all but I could see how if you have mobility issues, this could be difficult!!
Thanks Joe & Jess!

The home is lovely and the views are beautiful! Joe and Jess are superb hosts with great communication and attention to detail. Home was well stocked and close to everything. Perfect for just relaxing or enjoying all that the Berkshires are known for. I highly recommend staying here.
Joseph was a phenomenal host. We absolutely loved the house, it was so charming and clean and had beautiful views. Was really close to everything we needed. Would a solidly stay there again.

This is a spacious partly renovated house. It does have breathtaking views , but the noisy highway between it and the lake moderates the serenity one might hope for in such a setting. Joe is a great host.

This home is absolutely beautiful. The sun room overlooking the lake is beyond your dreams. We spent time hanging in this room viewing sunrises, sunsets, and eagles over the lake. The hosts were attentive and responsive while also respecting your privacy. This was our best Airbnb experience yet.

Great central location, no more than a 30 minute drive from anything you’d want to do in the Berkshires. Beautiful view of the lake and surrounding hills from the deck and great room, where we spent a lot of time. Great Wi-Fi and streaming to TVs in the kitchen, living room and great room. Joe and Jess were really attentive and thoughtful hosts.
Great place, would stay again

The location offers the best of both worlds as you are able to experience some of nature’s beauty, but are also close to town, restaurants, and things to do in general. Joe and Jess are wonderful hosts and extremely responsive. They offered suggestions both before and during our stay and checked to see if we needed anything. We can’t wait to go back to the Berkshires and hope to stay with Joe and Jess!

What a great home! The hosts were extremely responsive, the house was clean and bright and well-stocked, and the view was incredible! We had a wonderful weekend and give this place a 10/10. If you have a chance to stay here, jump on it. You won’t be disappointed
Great rental!

Was very happy with this reservation! Host was kind and responded quick. Great night away with my husband. He enjoyed fishing and I enjoyed the beautiful scenery. Would definitely stay again worth every penny!

Great place to stay! Had everything we needed and such a beautiful setting.

The "Nest" is beautiful inside and out, and super cute to boot! Mary is a great host with quick communication and thoughtful touches like putting out a crib and some toys for our baby. Thanks so much and we'll be back if we're in Pittsfield again!

Wonderful location for sunset chasers/lovers! Adorable dogs next door. Felt right at home at the cozy cabin…they had little snacks all set up in the kitchen along with coffee/tea. Can’t wait to go back!!

Mary is such a kind, wonderful host! Our stay in The Nest at Birdland was absolutely amazing and comfortable. The home was clean and in the perfect location for our snowboarding trip to Jiminy Peak. Exactly what we were looking for, a quiet and spacious retreat while still being very nea downtown Pittsfield. A beautiful space and great host.

Wow, I can't say enough about this Airbnb host and the space. I am a superhost myself and I was super impressed. The place is spotless, comfortable and without clutter. Hosts like this make Airbnb such a rewarding experience.
Adorable space! Convenient to everything in the Berkshire region. Wonderful weekend stay.
A wonderful, secluded place to stay within a few minutes drive to downtown Pittsfield! So glad we stayed a night!

The Nest is one of my favorite airbnbs I have stayed in! Mary did such a beautiful job decorating the place, you can tell a lot of thought went into the space. It truly has everything you need. The Nest is a beautiful and comfortable place to stay in a wonderful and peaceful location.
Very clean, cozy, and quaint! Mary was friendly and made me feel right at home. The Nest is in a beautiful neighborhood among rolling fields and Mountain views. A perfect New England retreat!
Beautiful peaceful loft in Pittsfield, so calming, comfortable fun quirky decor, thoughtful snacks, great tea/coffee offerings. Nice books to read.

This was such a great little space. Loved sitting on the balcony and relaxing after a week of road-tripping. Cozy and clean, convenient location to all the things we wanted to do, yet far enough away that you felt like you were away from it all. We enjoyed visits to Stockbridge and Naumkeag. Glad we found this little gem and would have loved to have stayed longer.

I had a wonderful time at The Nest! it's a nice open 2 floor space with cute furniture and lots of beautiful plants around the space. It has a deck, and big outdoor space with a firepit. Mary was extremely responsive, kind, and accomodating. I would definitely stay there again!
Mary’s place was beautiful and she was very helpful! Got to meet her and her pups and it was a great time. Highly recommend the nest!

The Nest is a loverly place! Amenities are new, decoration are great! I enjoy the libraries and all the details in the Nest. Mary is a wonderful host. Will definitely come back for next year during the Tanglewood season.

Absolutely beautiful! The listing was exactly as described and Mary was extremely helpful whenever we had questions prior to our stay. Easy drive to Tanglewood, we can't wait to stay here again next year.

We had such a lovely stay at The Nest. The location was beautiful and peaceful, and the accommodations were cozy and had everything we needed. Very comfortable bed, excellent shower/toiletries and nice welcome snacks. Would absolutely stay again on a future visit to the Berkshires.

We had a great stay!
Very close Tanglewood and Mary gave us helpful hints about where to eat.
We will definitely come back next time we go to Tanglewood!
Neat as anywhere I’ve stayed!
Mary's place is awesome. Really clean, quiet location, and the welcoming party of adorable dogs is always a treat!

Quick drive to the best of what Pittsfield, Lennox, and lee have to offer while situated next to farmland. Can't recommend enough!

Mary's guest cottage was lovely- quiet, and thoughtfully appointed for anything you'd need for a short stay in the Berkshires. Lots of pleasant touches and Mary was an extremely accomodating and communicative host.

We loved our stay at "The Nest." The space is comfortable and SUPER CLEAN. It's a great location for artsy outings from Jacob's Pillow to The Clark.

Beautiful second floor apartment close to downtown Pittsfield.

A great place and a great stay! Very homey and warm. Bed is great. Would stay again. I would rent this place full time if I could!

Thanks, Robert, for the friendly greeting on the chalk board and for having such a lovely place. Great location for visiting Tanglewood. We’ll be back!

This was a really great experience! It was so clean and well-organized, down to the nightstands with USB chargers, a coffee pot and keurig with coffee, and a basket of snacks. It was so easy and such a pleasure to stay here. I would definitely come back!
This place was just as advertised. Kids loved playing the games in the basement. The beds were comfortable and the shower worked great!

Great hosts and Fran next door is fabulous. The house is incredible and very comfortable. I like places that have personal touches and feel like a home versus a hotel. I wish we could have stayed longer.

This home is a great place to stay! Very clean, spacious, and the foosball table in the basement was so fun for my kids. Everything is organized and tidy. I appreciated being able to use the pack and play and that it was already set up. We enjoyed our stay and hope to stay here again if our travels bring us back this way!
Really comfortable house, good beds, well equipped kitchen, the game room in the basement such a nice bonus, fully recommend!
My husband, infant, mother-in-law, and I stayed here for one night. It is spacious, well out-fitted, and has very comfy beds!
Great place, well equipped and close to many shops and restaurants. Perfect for weekends in the Berkshires. Communication with Felyce was very easy.
The house is very cozy and impeccably clean. It felt like a home away from home.
Great place nestled in the heart of the berkshires
Great place, exactly as advertised. Super clean and fully stocked with everything needed for a short stay in the Berkshires. Very convenient location to everything. Five stars!
Very cozy and comfortable. Good communication with owners. Thank you so much!

Wonderful hosts!! Easy, fast communication & clear instructions re: check-in/out. A lovely, clean home with thoughtful extra touches: snacks, coffee, toiletries. We truly felt at home here. Highly recommend this house.

Roomy house in Pittsfield, very quiet street/neighborhood. House has lots of places to spread out so our group didn't feel cramped. Kitchen well appointed. Plenty of towels/sheets/toilet paper! Felyce is a great hostess, even met us when we arrived and showed us around the house.
Very clean and comfortable, the hosts have put thoughtful touches around the house to welcome guests. Highly recommend a stay here.
Felyce could not have been nicer! The house was clean and well equipped . Many thanks for making our stay so enjoyable!
Beautiful house, nice hosts with prompt responses, detailed instructions on welcome book. We enjoyed the piano and had a wonderful time here with friends, will definitely come back again!
Convenient to many venues.

Felyce was very friendly and welcoming. The house was the perfect size for my family getaway. We slept 5 very comfortable. Having the 2 full bathrooms was a huge plus!!! Thank you for sharing your home with us. Maria

This beautifully renovated house is located in a quiet neighborhood and has lovely flower gardens. Felyce has thought of everything you could need or want including snacks and a piano for those who are musically inclined. Our favorite local activity was renting a pontoon boat on Lake Pontoosuc (make a reservation prior to your stay). In retrospect this home rates in the top 3 Airbnbs we’ve ever stayed in. Highly recommend.

Felyce is a terrific host- she met us to show us around, and was immediately available to answer questions later. The house is newly renovated and you can tell by the hardwood floors, kitchen and bathrooms. It is spotless, comfortably furnished with an excellent kitchen – new appliances, good knives and everything one would need. There were thoughtful touches like snacks for hungry travelers on arrival and two kinds of coffee makers. I love soft towels and comfortable beds and this house gets an A+. It’s a quiet neighborhood and a private driveway.
A great home with a beautiful backyard. The space was perfect for a group of 5. It was so cozy! And response time was great from the host. They were extremely accommodating
Love this house! Lovely neighborhood and close everything. The house is new and was spotless. The hosts were super sweet and easy to reach. We loved the yard and the deck as well. Highly recommend.
Very comfortable, centrally located home, with a great covered porch and wonderful back yard with fire pit.

Everyone in our group was very impressed with the home. Very clean and well decorated, with many nice touches. We found the beds very comfortable and appreciated the coffee and tea. We also found a really outstanding Italian restaurant close by called Sibaritas, which we recommend as well.
Felyce was so kind Her home was clean and easily accommodated 6 of us

Felyce is hands-down the best host we've ever had. She is so organized and responsive, and the house is full of thoughtful touches, like a full coffee station, a snack bowl, and more. Even a grand piano to play, if you're a pianist. Thank you, Felyce!
Very clean, fully stocked apartment, and excellent hosts! We thoroughly enjoyed our stay!

A beautiful home with everything you would need plus more (good variety of snacks for kids, BBQ and fire pit for s'mores). Check in was easy and all the info was very clear. There was great communication with the hosting team. The home is cozy and sparkling clean. All the beds are very comfortable. Exactly as described. The neighborhood is quiet with deer sightings. Everything we needed was in very close proximity. Groceries, dining, hiking trails, summer adventure park etc. The hosts live just next door. They can help you with any need on short notice. Highly recommend it ! It is definitely one of the best Airbnb homes we stayed at. We are very much looking forward to staying again !

This house was exactly as it looked. Charming, neat as a pin, new and fresh. The hosts were responsive and friendly. Lovely, well kept garden. Very easy to get to everything the Berkshires have to offer from here.
Wonderful place to stay! Warm welcoming host family!

This is our first AIRBNB stay, and Jia and Felyce are great hosts. House is clean, tidy, and full of warmth. They are super responsive. Any question was answered within 10 minutes. The house is clean and has everything you need. We had a 4-year-old traveling with us, and Jia ordered a bed rail for us. This is so sweet and thoughtful. We will definitely come back again. Thank you!

This house on the lake had beautiful views, was private, very clean, well equipped and so cozy! We loved the wood burning fireplace and cooking and hanging out in the kitchen. Everyone played ping pong and the availability of the bikes was terrific. The piano was also nice to have in a vacation home!
Kayaking on the lake was so tranquil and the kids loved the big swing. We shopped for groceries at Guido's Fresh Marketplace, (great selections)!
Nearby towns were full of restaurants and rich history. We recommend visiting the Pleasant Valley Wildlife Sanctuary. Our family of 4 adults and 3 children loved the nature walk. Speaking of nature, the views from every window in the house were lovely.
Our host was a great communicator and all instructions were well laid out. We highly recommend this peaceful property for your next family trip!
The house was fantastic! Great Lake views and all comfortable. And the owner was very responsive.

Paul’s home was perfect for our family getaway to the Berkshires. Not only was the home spotless, it was fully stocked - all kitchen needs, extra linens, games and activities, BOATS! With spotty weather, we spent a lot of time hanging out at the house and the layout is perfect so that adults and kids had their own spaces, but the communal space was large enough for all. It was one of the best airbnb experiences we have ever had!
Paul was both responsive and proactive, and we had wine and treats waiting for us upon arrival - a truly wonderful host!

Paul’s home is beautiful and a great location right on the water. The kitchen island is huge and perfect size for all of us to sit, chat and play games. We’re a big game night family.
Love the open layout to the living room and the couches are super comfortable! Couldn’t get up after a while because they were so cozy. Lol.
All of the beds and pillows were extremely comfortable as well.
Can’t finish this review without mentioning the steam shower and jacuzzi - incredible!! Especially after a day of snowboarding.
We were a group of 8 and the house was perfect for us.
The entire house is a 10/10.
Paul was super responsive, provided more than enough information about the house and the area, and the house was really clean.
We had such a great experience and want to come back in the summer to make use of the kayaks and paddle boards!!

Great house, even better than the pictures! House was fully equipped, specially the kitchen! Place was spotless in communication with you on our was fantastic! It is winter so we could not enjoy much the outdoors but the backyard has direct access to the lake so I am sure it has to be very beautiful in the summer!

We had a wonderful stay at this beautiful home! The location is gorgeous and overlooks the lake. The home was clean, full of amenities, comfortable, and cozy. We appreciated the delicious cookies and bottle of wine left by our hosts as well. It’s conveniently located near Bousquet Mountain and we enjoyed a couple of lovely winter hikes nearby as well. The instructions and communication were clear and we hope to return sometime again in the summer to enjoy the lake!
A clean, comfortable home with lots of cool spaces and amenities. We had a wonderful, relaxing weekend with our friend group.

My friends and I had such a wonderful weekend staying here! The house was beautiful and looked just like the photos! It was well stocked with everything we needed for cooking, exercising, and even playing board games! The scenery was stunning and the property felt very private. Paul was responsive before and during our stay and was super helpful answering questions that we had leading up.
I would absolutely recommend staying here! I hope to come back sometime in the summer when the lake isn’t frozen!
Very clean, well maintained, communicative owner and met all of our needs. Would definitely like to stay again and would highly recommend to others!

Paul’s place was just as advertised, a modern updated home with fantastic lake access and a quiet, walkable community with great neighbors and nearby access to so many of the regions amenities. We loved the dock, pond and water sport crafts (paddle boards and kayaks) that Paul has available for use. The short walk to Balderdash winery was a nice bonus too as an afternoon outing to break up our fun on the water. A great place for families. We’ll definitely book again next time we’re in the area!
Paul’s house was beautiful and had everything we needed for a nice weekend on the lake.

This home was awesome for our family vacation. The lake view is one of the best in the Berkshires. Tons of amenities. Bikes, kayaks, ping pong. Very very quiet location with a huge yard and private dock. We loved the smart tvs in all the rooms, the huge kitchen island, and the cold AC.
This is a fantastic home to stay in with a big group. The downstairs area has a really cool private apartment style feel with an amazing tub and steam shower.
We had 3 couples and one 3 year old at this house and still had an extra bedroom we didn’t use. So it felt really nice to spread out and have 3 bathrooms for each couple.
We will definitely be back and strongly recommend this airbnb if you want Lake access, fire pit, and privacy!
Beautiful lake front home with gorgeous views of lake and mountains.

Comfortable place for a few families to stay. Overall, felt the oven and grill didn’t work well and the lawn wasn’t very usable because it was covered in goose poop, but it was a beautiful view. Bedrooms were very comfortable and Paul was very responsive.

The home was in a great location close to family that lives in the area so was very convenient We walked to Bartletts for apple cider donuts one morning which is very close to home. We enjoyed kayaking and paddle boards on the lake they provided! We had the great views of the lake from the living room and bedrooms. The bathroom off the master was a vibe! Aromatherapy, music, steam and shower was amazing. All of us ended up using it and felt rejuvenated. I accidentally locked the garage door and they were there with the key the same day. Super responsive. My husband forget his AirPods and they offered to ship back to us. Very kind! All in all we had great time!

Amazing location and thoughtful host. Had a bottle of wine waiting along with some delicious cookies. House is beautiful, much larger than it looks in the pics. The lake is awesome and Paul provides plenty of kayaks and paddle boards. Great place to stay if you want to be right on the water.

We shared the house with another family and our kids and had a great stay for a long weekend in February. The house was beautiful and the lake views were stunning. The home was cozy for the winter season and we can’t wait to go back in the summer! Paul and Shana left us a bottle of wine and cookies to start our stay - such a sweet touch!!! Highly recommend!!!
Eileen’s home was peaceful, comfortable, and full of thoughtful touches that made my stay wonderful during the Thanksgiving holiday. I’d definitely return!

Our stay at Eileen's was just what we were looking for. She was flexible with the sign in time to meet our changing needs. The neighborhood was safe, and parking was easy. It was a very peaceful stay. We would stay again if in the Berkshires.

We had a great two-night visit with Eileen and her two cats. We felt at home, and the house was spotless. Eileen was welcoming, with the right mix of friendliness and allowing us our own space. She was helpful with tips about the area and very accommodating. Our rooms were spacious, with our own den and comfortable access to common use sun rooms. Really delightful, and very reasonably priced. We felt like we made a friend.

My second time staying here. Even better than the first - just have to remember to take my shoes off before I walk in! not an issue though. The cats were super friendly and Eileen provides a sweet basket of treats, including homemade zucchini bread.

Eileen’s place is a gem.
Super clean, well appointed, private accommodation, with a nice sitting/tv area, access to the kitchen and all rooms on the first floor including the front porch. Nice backyard which is private with lots of seating including a patio with nice outdoor furniture. The small back yard is beautifully maintained with flowering bushes and plants. Parking is well off the street and adequately sized.
Eileen pays close attention to detail and the sleeping accommodations are comfortable with a memory foam mattress and pillows.
Eileen is a gracious host and conversation is easy. She has traveled, done interesting things, and she maintains a house with grace and deep sense of peace. Of course her cats, when they warm up to you, are curious, wonderful, playful and delightful to be around.
Loved staying here! Eileen is a great host and friend; she’s great at Ticket To Ride, and her two cats are adorable :) Very hospitable, affable, and attentive !!
I would recommend this place to anyone! A beautiful place filled with exquisite tastes and flairs. If we ever come back to Berkshire, we would definitely love to stay here again.
Love staying at Eileen’s place! A home away from home. Perfectly appointed guest space all to yourself and a wonderful experience all around. Will return again with pleasure. Thank you Eileen!

What a gem! Eileen’s house is cozy and impeccable and the Airbnb section of the house is three rooms — private den, bathroom and bedroom — all to yourself!
Will be a repeat guest with pleasure, thank you Eileen!

Eileen was the perfect hostess. She was available to talk but also gave me my own space. Her place was in a great location and I love the fact that there was a separate entrance and that I had a separate wing of her house. I highly recommend her home for people visiting Pittsfield.
As always, Eileen was the perfect host. Her house is spotless and both she and her kitties are warm and welcoming.

Eileen was friendly, welcoming, and apologetic for some minor construction that was being done, which was a complete non-issue, as I didn't even notice any mess. Her home and yard are truly lovely-it's a shame we didn't get to spend more time in the house, taking advantage of her sunrooms, which we were welcome to make use of. We did get time to spend some quality time with her cats, Mia and Barrett, and witness Mia's skill with the paper balls! (All to a great soundtrack, playing quietly in the background) Would definitely book again.

Eileen was a wonderful host, provided tasteful and immaculate accomodations, and went the extra mile to make us feel welcome to the Tanglewood area, which is only 10-15 min away. We look forward to going back again!

Comfy bedroom with small refrigerator and coffee maker, private den and bathroom off the kitchen. Eileen is very friendly and also shared the common areas on the first floor. She prefers that you take your shoes off before entering the house and she has two lovely young, curious cats. Lovely neighborhood.

We loved our stay at Eileen’s. The house is lovely, the Airbnb accommodations are super cozy and comfortable, even though it’s right in her house, we had a private bathroom and a whole private den with TV and cozy couch, in addition to the comfortable bedroom. She was very creative, she created a little coffee nook where there was a closet off the bedroom and it is very inviting and allowed us to make coffee first thing when we wake up which is something very important to us. She even put a fresh container of half-and-half in the mini fridge which was great, and something I don’t find hosts usually do!
Eileen is very friendly and fun to talk to, and welcomed us to use all of the first floor of her home including a lovely front porch, and a cozy, comfortable sunporch in the back of the house. She was engaging when we wanted to socialize and also very respectful of our privacy. This was a great stay and we would absolutely love to come here again!

Thoroughly enjoyed our stay here. Eileen was a delight to meet. Friendly, but also allowing space for privacy. The entire place was spotless and full of interesting decor. Two porches and a deck to relax and soak up the sun. Our quarters were comfy and well equipped. My son lives nearby, making it convenient for us. We will definitely book again the next time we visit Pittsfield.
Eileen is a great host. I will definitely stay there again if she has availability next time I'm in town.

Eileen's place is a great stay! Eileen is a very good host. She made me feel like I was her friend, who came for a visit. She was available, but completely non-obtrusive. The entire house is delightfully and tastefully decorated. The rental space is both connected to the rest of the house and also private. The room has a good lock. The space is ample; two large rooms and a bathroom, connected by a service hall. There is plenty of closet space, counter space and empty dresser drawers to unpack your suitcases completely. This reall adds to the welcome and freindly feeling. It doesn't feel like a rental. It feels like, well...visiting a friend.
Perfect spot. Can’t wait to come back!

Eileen was a gem of a host: very friendly, great to talk to, respectful, and responsive. She also had no problems accommodating my late arrival, which I was very grateful for. The place itself is incredible. Spacious, spotless, sunlit, and with everything you need. And the cats are adorable. (You can close the door if you don't want them coming in.) I hope to stay here again next time I'm in the area!
Amazing AirBnB! I went to Pittsfield on Amtrak for some hiking, and Eileen was super nice and drove me to the trailhead in the morning so I didn't have to take the bus.

We had a wonderful long stay at Eileen’s. The space was perfect for us. It’s clean, comfortable and beautifully decorated. The kitchen is very well equipped with every possible gadget. The neighborhood is lovely to walk in as well as convenient, very quiet and centrally located. Eileen is the perfect host. She’s interesting to get to know, and she takes good care of her guests including providing baked goods that are yummy. She anticipates your needs, and she provides the perfect balance of interacting with guests and giving them privacy. Her two cats, Mia and Barrett, are delightful and fun to play with. We are already planning our return.

Eileen is an excellent host. She goes out of her way to make her guests feel welcome in her cozy home and to take care of them to the highest standard. In addition, you will have all the comforts of home, with the full use of the downstairs rooms. With me, I feel she went above and beyond when she picked me up late at night from Tanglewood when Uber failed me! I cannot recommend highly enough a stay with her in Pittsfield, MA. On top of that, she is a great conversationalist!

There is nothing not to love about staying with Eileen: prompt, clear and timely communication, two adorable cats, a spacious, quiet, and spotless home where one has the use of the whole ground floor including the kitchen. There is also one’s own bedroom, bath, and living area. In the bedroom is a fridge with freezer compartment. The bed is super comfortable! Eileen is a thoughtful host who respects one’s privacy and yet is great company. Her home is convenient to Tanglewood as well as to Williamstown. We can’t wait to return!
Lovely host, beautiful house and the cutest cats! Loved getting to spend time here and chatting with the host in the morning. 10/10 would stay again!

If you could design the perfect AirBandB stay, Eileen’s would be it! Clean and spacious. Welcoming and quiet. Centrally located making area attractions under a 30 min. drive.
Eileen and her two beautiful cats were very welcoming and made us feel as though we were visiting a longtime friend.
The bedroom, bathroom and den are accessible in a private hallway and are exceptionally clean. Guests also have access to the front porch (lovely), back sunroom (sweet) and small back deck (beautiful flower garden!) Off-street parking in a quiet neighborhood. Can’t wait to return!

Eileen's Place is an outstanding destination. She is warm, welcoming, gracious and spirited with a vast knowledge on numerous subjects. Her place is cozy and decorated with objects from her world wide travels. She keeps her home immaculate.
A must stay if you are going to the Berkshires.

What a wonderful stay! Such incredible hospitality and so much fun! I had a charming and comfy bedroom complete with my own little coffee area and fridge, plus access to the entire first floor (kitchen, living room and a study where I could look out on the garden as I worked). Eileen’s baked goods and breakfast treats were always on offer.
Eileen was a welcoming and easygoing hostess. We both had busy schedules but found time for some relaxing evening chats. I loved hearing tales of Eileen’s travels and her days as an Arabian horse breeder, and being entertained by her sweet and playful cats – ll-month-old Mia and 10-week-old Barrett. Eileen was a great listener too - and super-helpful. She made sure, and double-sure, I had everything I could possibly want or need as a guest in her lovely home. (She even gave me great advice on how to transport huge bouquets all the way back to New York without emptying a drop of water from the vase!)
Eileen and her cat Mia couldn’t have been more inviting! The place is spotless and easy to use. It was the perfect location for me to vend at the Berkshires Arts Festival. I will definitely be back!

Eileen's home is clean, welcoming, and homey. The experience was perfect for my stress free vacation. If you're looking to visit the state parks the location is perfect. I would happily stay here again.

What a wonderful Air bnb regarding all aspects you can think of.
We enjoyed the space, Eileen’s hospitality, playing with her cat; Mia and the location within Pittsfield.
She offered us extra warm clothing, blanket and umbrella due to attending a concert at Tanglewood in the cold and rain which saved the day. Thank-you Eileen!
Don’t blink…you might think you are staying in a top notch inn in Lenox.
Had an excellent and comfortable stay! Lots of space, a soft bed, great amenities, and a very cute cat—what more could you want? :)

What a gem!! Can’t believe how much work has been put into this home in terms of decorations and atmosphere. If you appreciate these things, you can’t go wrong. Very private staying area, and great company from Eileen and Mia (her friendly kitten).
I suggest spending at least one night on the front (or back) porch with Eileen to talk life and experiences. She has so much to offer, and next time we are in the area - we will be back.
Eileen is a wonderful host!! She is well traveled and her adventures are told through her photography. Her home is lovely and her cat Mia is a genius!

I highly suggest, if you are in the Berkshires, to stay with Eileen. A lovely home, quite accommodating, friendly, private to your liking, and easy access to all the local places of interest. She allowed me the use of a lovely kitchen, which was overly stocked with the details, those who enjoy cooking, would need, and provided all the bells and whistles as that of a lovely boutique space. There is little comparison of anything in her area that can compete on cleanliness, pricing, and value provided. Thanks Eileen. Smart and inviting. I will be back.
Eileen was an excellent host! Her house was well appointed and just as described! It was a perfect spot for a weekend getaway.

Eileen's place is one of the nicest, best located, and real value. The place was very clean, modern, had everything we needed to feel at home, and was an easy drive to all the sites we wanted to see including its neighboring states- New York, Vermont, New Hampshire, Connecticut, etc. Eileen's a great baker and a good cook as well. Enjoyed her cookies, fresh baked breads and lasagna. Communication was great too. Eileen is the perfect host- thoughtful, helpful and accommodating. I would highly recommend this wonderful place!
The place was very clean, and Eileen was very friendly and easy-going. I would definitely stay there again.
